title: @Riot - Champions with outdated ability icons.
body:
Can the old champions have fresh set of ability icons? It is really outdated
i.e. amumu, anivia, fiddlesticks, nunu and many others.

The problem we run into when doing these roster updates on old champions is that if we change one ability we have 2 options,

1) Update the one ability icon but make it look low quality to match the old ones, or;
2) Update all there icons.

We would like the do option 2 if possible in all cases that need it.

Not sure if you are the right person to ask about this, but are the newer icons going to go further into all having the same color scheme? Because one of the things I like about a lot of old icons is that each icon usually had its own color, while nowadays each icon for a champion seems, in general, to be the same/similar color.

A good example of this is Gragas's new icons, where each one is almost the exact same color (magenta). In fact when the icons are small or out of the corner of your eye Gragas's Q and E look the same.

I much prefer Lux's color scheme for her icons where it goes gold (P), brown & gold (Q), blue (W), white blue & gold (E), and rainbow (R). Each icon is easy to tell apart.
Grag's pink abilities should be the same colour as passive.
Can't believe no one's pointed Renekton, who was VU a long time ago now and still has those old outdated icons :P

Although I don't think they're too bad, I wouldn't mind new icons ;3
{{summoner:31}}

Can someone explain to me why these Icons werent used already?
http://img3.leaguecraft.com/skins/asset/skin_1442683555_760px_66033_1.jpg
http://img1.leaguecraft.com/skins/asset/skin_1442683417_760px_66043_1.jpg

Im curious as to why, they seem adequate.

Well if I had to guess, at a glance I can't really differentiate between each spell.
Every spell is a very similar color (or the same color for Anivia).

That's not a great reason but...
Speaking of old ability icons, Mundo needs his fixed in the client.  They are fine in game, but the images in the client are old.

Can somebody tell me why Graves' ability icons did not get updated during the preseason/rework? I mean, they just changed the icon for the Q, which was absolutely necessary (and it seems like you followed the first way to make it :D ), but I think that at least the passive's icon needed to be updated as well (it is good for the old passive, but not for the new one :/ ). And, following the line of action that you described, maybe all the other icons too should be remade. So... why not? :)
(please forgive me if I made any grammar mistake, since English isn't my mother tongue :/ )

This is a question of Time. The Marksmen update was done in a much shorter timeframe then the Mage update we are currently working on. Both the juggernaut and the Marksmen update were done in roughly 4 months. The short time makes it harder to complete entire icon sets for the Champions. 

We have since decided to increase the length of our roster projects in order to increase the quality in both design and FX. We did 7 Marksmen in roughly 4 months last roster project, while this time we are targeting 6 Mages in roughly 6 months. While we might not get to updating ALL the icons for all the champions that need it for the mage roster project, the added time does allow us a bit more room to get more icons updated then previous projects.
Rumble icon updates?
Since Udyr is not going to have a VU ~~anytime soon~~, it would be cool to see a new icons set for him... Cmon, even the tough guys need some love {{item:3151}}
